name: Harvest Haul
description:
In this arcade-style game, inspired by stardew valley and overcooked, you will play as a farmer that gets orders for root vegetables and he needs to grow and deliver them quickly. 

Made for Global Game Jam 2023! - Made by me and by Shahar Guini

Credits:

Kenney - https://www.kenney.nl/assets

 Beavy Store - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/free-pickup-truck-with-ba...
